Name: Guardian Giant
Traits: Vigilant. The giant can't be surprised.
Actions: Multiattack. The giant makes three spear attacks. Spear. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage, or 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
Reactions: Protection. When an attacker the giant can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 10 feet of the giant, the giant can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
